entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow this evening and ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
